snippet: In “The Lobster,” Colin Farrell plays a divorced man who has 45 days to find his soul mate or be turned into a crustacean. And “Looking: The Movie” brings closure to the beloved HBO series....
lead_paragraph: In “The Lobster,” Colin Farrell plays a divorced man who has 45 days to find his soul mate or be turned into a crustacean. And “Looking: The Movie” brings closure to the beloved HBO series.
